profile-description: AI & Data Solutions Engineer with expertise in architecting end-to-end solutions that integrate Web Development, AI, and Data Engineering. Passionate about transforming complex data into actionable insights and AI-driven automation leveraging modern web technologies, cloud services, and machine learning.

about-me.para1: Passionate about engineering intelligent, high-performance AI systems that drive real-world impact through advanced machine learning, deep learning, and scalable deployment architectures. Experienced in developing multimodal AI solutions, optimizing model inference pipelines, and deploying production-ready systems that enhance automation, predictive analytics, and decision-making across autonomous and healthcare domains.
about-me.para2: Currently holding a Master's in Computer Science from Westcliff University with a strong GPA of 3.81/4.0, specializing in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI System Optimization. Actively seeking full-time opportunities in the U.S. to leverage advanced technical expertise in building next-generation AI solutions in a dynamic, innovation-driven environment.
about-me.para3: Currently serving as an ML Engineer at VSD Infotech, pioneering the development of cutting-edge multimodal AI systems that integrate real-time video, lidar, and sensor data for autonomous environments. Achieved a 40% performance boost in model inference using NVIDIA TensorRT and Triton Inference Server, while designing scalable MLOps pipelines that reduced iteration cycles by 35% and operational costs by 20%. Successfully integrated Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks for intelligent video summarization and developed attention-based models for enhanced predictive analytics in complex video streams.
about-me.para4: Demonstrated research excellence through multiple publications in image classification, deep learning, and computer vision, with work under review at IEEE conferences. Built diverse AI applications spanning sentiment analysis with GPT-4 and Gemini APIs achieving 90% accuracy, multimodal generative AI systems with Gemini Pro, and healthcare-focused solutions for real-time nutritional analysis. Currently developing an ambitious AI-driven healthcare documentation system integrating speech recognition, NLP, and LLMs with HIPAA-compliant architecture for clinical workflow enhancement.
about-me.para5: Deeply committed to solving complex AI challenges through scalable architectures, intelligent automation, and cutting-edge deep learning integration. Always looking to collaborate on high-impact projects at the intersection of machine learning, computer vision, and production AI systems.
